sect1.title: General
sect1.para: The component Adaptations deals with reading and writing of information using some of the DIDs particularly defined in the system level using this adaptations we can read and write to the system for specific operation. and we have differenent types of adaptations in ICAS defined in that way if Gateway using the particular AdptationDIDS we are calling as GWAdaptation DID's.

Adapatation has following main tasks:
After a request from DCM for DIDs Read and write, it has to trigger that particular call back which is configured in Eb tresos with respect to that particular DID.
And Send the response to the DCM .
